pages.title: Spell Stone
pages.text: The Spell Stone is required to create $(l:e_spell_overview)Spells/el. The GUI of this block can only be opened if the correct structure is built around it. Inside the GUI there is a slot for a $(l:e_item_spell_scroll)Spell Scroll/el where you can put an empty or already filled $(l:e_item_spell_scroll)Spell/el. There are also 5 slots for items that need to be filled with the correct items to create different $(l:e_spell_parts)Spell Components/el.

The Add-button is used to add the currently selected $(l:e_spell_parts)Spell Component/el to the list below. This action will remove one of each required item. Finally, when you are finished with the list, you have to bind the selected $(l:e_spell_parts)Components/el to the spell by clicking the Bind-button.
